subject: X Games
Olympic Games (2006)
lead_paragraph: In a stunning repeat of her performance at the Winter Olympics, Lindsey Jacobellis had to settle for a silver medal Saturday after falling just before the finish during the snowboarder X final.
snippet: In a stunning repeat of her performance at the Winter Olympics, Lindsey Jacobellis had to settle for a silver medal Saturday after falling just before the finish during the snowboarder X final.
